rich-page.field:
<h1>Welcome to the <i>$page.fields.project.render.withIcon(false)</i> Project</h1>

############################################################################### ## ## Velocity Context - following objects are in the velocity context ## ## com.polarion.alm.shared.api.transaction.ReadOnlyTransaction $transaction ## com.polarion.alm.shared.api.model.rp.RichPage $page ## com.polarion.alm.shared.api.model.rp.widget.RichPageWidgetRenderingContext $widgetContext ## ############################################################################### ## ## Macros ## #macro(spaceInfo $title $link $text $imgLink) <tr> <td style="width: 150px; padding: 2px;"> <img src="$imgLink" style="width: 80px; padding: 24px 20px 5px 40px;" alt="$title" title="$title" /> </td> <td style="padding: 12px 5% 12px 0;"> <a href="$link" target="_top"><span style="font-size: 125%;">$title</span></a><br/> $text </td> </tr> #end ############################################################################### ## ## Render ## #set($projectId = $page.getReference().projectId()) #set($tableStyle = "width: 100%; margin-left: auto; margin-right: auto; empty-cells: show; border-collapse: collapse; vertical-align: middle; text-align: justify;") <table style="$tableStyle"> <tr> <td style="width: 300px; padding: 2px;"> <img src="/polarion/page-attachment/$projectId/_default/Home/home.png" style="width: 250px; padding: 15px 20px 12px 0;" alt="Home Page" title="Home Page"> </td> <td style="padding: 12px 5% 12px 0;"> $page.fields().project().get().fields().description().render() </td> </tr> </table> #set($projectId = $page.getReference().projectId()) <table style="$tableStyle"> ## Dashboard #set($link = $transaction.context().createPortalLink().project("$projectId").richPage("", "Dashboard").toEncodedRelativeUrl()) #set($text = "<ul><li> See a high-level overview of the current status of all activities.</li></ul>") #set($imgLink = "/polarion/page-attachment/$projectId/_default/Home/dashboard.png") #spaceInfo("Dashboard" $link $text $imgLink) ## Specification #set($link = $transaction.context().createPortalLink().project("$projectId").richPage("Specification", "Home").toEncodedRelativeUrl()) #set($text = "<ul><li> Create Product Specifications using Requirements, Constraints, Regulations and other policies. </li><li> Review Requirement statistics.</li> <li> Learn how to manage the Backlog.</li></ul>") #set($imgLink = "/polarion/page-attachment/$projectId/_default/Home/specification.png") #spaceInfo("Specification" $link $text $imgLink) ## Planning #set($link = $transaction.context().createPortalLink().project("$projectId").richPage("Planning", "Home").toEncodedRelativeUrl()) #set($text = " <ul><li>Manage unplanned items to plan future Releases. </li><li>Review ongoing and completed Releases. </li><li>Display the Release Statistics.</li><li>Learn how to plan a Release.</li></ul>") #set($imgLink = "/polarion/page-attachment/$projectId/_default/Home/planning.png") #spaceInfo("Planning" $link $text $imgLink) ## Development #set($link = $transaction.context().createPortalLink().project("$projectId").richPage("Development", "Home").toEncodedRelativeUrl()) #set($text = "<ul><li>Manage unplanned items to plan future Iterations. </li><li>Review ongoing and completed Iterations.</li><li>Display Iterations for the current Release and their Statistics. </li><li>Describe the Development Environment.<br/> </li><li>Learn how to plan an Iteration.</li></ul>") #set($imgLink = "/polarion/page-attachment/$projectId/_default/Home/development.png") #spaceInfo("Development" $link $text $imgLink) ## Testing #set($link = $transaction.context().createPortalLink().project("$projectId").richPage("Testing", "Home").toEncodedRelativeUrl()) #set($text = "<ul><li>Manage Test Specifications. </li><li>Display Test Case Coverage and review Test Statistics.</li><li> Learn how to properly test your work.</li></ul>") #set($imgLink = "/polarion/page-attachment/$projectId/_default/Home/testing.png") #spaceInfo("Testing" $link $text $imgLink) ## Maintenance #set($link = $transaction.context().createPortalLink().project("$projectId").richPage("Maintenance", "Home").toEncodedRelativeUrl()) #set($text = "<ul><li>Manage Issue and Change Request Backlogs. </li><li>Review Issues, Test and Change Request Statistics.</li><li>Learn how to maintain the development.</li></ul>") #set($imgLink = "/polarion/page-attachment/$projectId/_default/Home/maintenance.png") #spaceInfo("Maintenance" $link $text $imgLink) </table>


Project Overview.

<b>Lead:</b> $page.fields.project.get().fields().lead().render()

#set($fields=$page.fields.project.get().fields()) #if ($fields.finish().get()) #set($finish =$fields.finish().render()) #else #set($finish ="--") #end <b>Start/Finish:</b> $fields.start().render() / $finish

<b>Active:</b> $page.fields.project.get.fields().active().render

Activities
